department: Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)/Ministere des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
short_summary: Engineering Services in Support of Cyber Security Engineering Program (CSEP), for DND/CAF, in the Classified and Designated Domains
description: Engineering activities in support of projects related to designing, planning, fielding and in-service support of new IM/IT security solutions, including, Remote C2, SGRS, EEDR, EFAS and EIDS, as well as enhancing existing capabilities to maintain the security posture of DND/CAF IM/IT systems and services in the Classified and Designated Domains.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** W6369-23P5PF: IT Engineering Professional Services in Support of the Cyber Security Engineering Program (CSEP)

**Reference Number:** WS4534876079-Doc4601242810

**Solicitation Number:** WS4534876079

**Publication Date:** May 23, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Amendment Date:** June 25, 2024

**Trade Agreements:** Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement.

**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Procurement Category:** SRV

**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity:** Department of National Defence (DND), 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:** Arden Aresta (SPAC/PSPC), arden.aresta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Description:** The solicitation seeks contractors to provide IT engineering professional services in support of the Cyber Security Engineering Program (CSEP). The services required include designing, planning, fielding, and in-service support of new IM/IT security solutions. The contractor must enhance existing capabilities to maintain the security posture of DND/CAF IM/IT systems and services in the Classified and Designated Domains. The requirement has an Indigenous Participation Plan.

**Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19799713?extsite=MTk3OTk3MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Attachments:** None

**Status:** Expired

By: [Your Name]
